description: Try our easy to follow Risi E Bisi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Risi E Bisi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat chicken stock in a saucepan. Keep warm at a low simmer.
Heat half the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. When bubbles subside, add onion and pancetta. Cook for 5 minutes until onion is pale. Stir in the rice and cook for 5 minutes until transparent.

Add 1/2 cup of stock and stir until absorbed. Add stock, in 1/2 cup batches, stirring continuously, until completely absorbed. Add peas with last batch of stock. Remove from heat. Stir in the parmesan and remaining butter. Serve.
